targets.query:
from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all_delta_1m")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Asia/Tokyo")

today_start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d, location: location)
today_9 = date.add(to: today_start, d: 9h)

yesterday_9 = date.add(to: today_9, d: -24h)

// 現在が今日の9時より前なら昨日の9時、それ以降なら今日の9時
start = if now() < today_9 then yesterday_9 else today_9

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> reduce(
      fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
        first: if accumulator.initialized then accumulator.first else float(v: r._value),
        last: float(v: r._value),
        initialized: true
      }),
      identity: {first: 0.0, last: 0.0, initialized: false}
    )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r.last - r.first}))

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "credit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["user"] == "${user}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -24h) // 直近24時間
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)

import "date"

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "credit_all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      time: r._time,
      value: r._value,
  }))

import "strings"

from(bucket: "dekapu-log")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mpp-savedata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^dc_ball_get_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.user == "${user}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _field:
          if r._field == "dc_medal_get_0" then "銅メダル"
          else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_1" then "銀メダル"
          else if r._field == "dc_medal_get_14" then "金メダル"
          else strings.replace(v: r._field, t: "dc_ball_get_", u: "ID:", i: 1)
      }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
